channel.title: Does Anybody Want A Hosting Discount?
channel.description:
ok i use siteground to host my website and i have 5 "gift cards" and i can send them to any 5 people here what the page says
[quote="nappyrash13"]SiteGround is happy to greet you with the upcoming holidays and to say thank you for choosing our services! To make your Christmas special we have prepared 5 FREE Christmas gift certificates for you. You may issue those certificates to 5 people you love, including yourself, and thus make 5 original Christmas presents!
Each gift certificate will allow the owner to purchase SiteGround hosting services with a $20 discount. All you have to do is type the full name of the recipient, his/her e-mail address and your greeting text.[/quote]
its not much but if you want it i just need the following info
[code]Name of recipient: E-mail of recipient: [/code]
